page.title: 01POPULATION,SITE,WEATHER
page.content: The population of{SHOTTS}is c.13000 SITUATION:Shotts is roughly half way between{EDINBURGH}in the East and {GLASGOW}in the West,at the highest point.The town itself is at an altitude of c.230m-750feet and lies between two main roads ,almost hidden from both. {LOCAL DIVISIONS}There are three areas in the town:{DYKEHEAD STANE} and {SPRINGHILL.}The areas are separate physically and to some extent socially {TRANSPORT}Shotts can be reached by road or rail as an Edinburgh-Glasgow rail route passes through.There are bus services. {CLIMATE}Shottsonians are quite proud of their bad weather,which they may occasionally exaggerate. Due to the altitude winter lasts a little longer and summer can be cold and windy.
